Question & Options:
Which of the following statements is true about the 2009 movie 'Dragonball Evolution'?"

A. ["The movie was based on a popular manga series."]
B. ["The movie was a romantic comedy."]
C. ["The movie had no cast."]

Correct Answer: The movie was based on a popular manga series.
